name: Dreams of Neon
description:
Asleep on the job, Androtu enjoys synthwave vibes. Dodge the walls and collect coins. WASD or Arrow Keys work for movement. You can teleport with your left mouse button. Caution! Teleporting costs you five coins!

All assets were made during a three hour stream (link below)!

Zuratu: Art

NegativeZero (royalstove): Music

Timmay: Code

Stream VOD:

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/685091678
